resources.string: Parasyte is a Japanese science fiction horror manga series written and illustrated by Hitoshi Iwaaki. It was published in Kodansha Morning Open Zōkan and Monthly Afternoon magazine from 1988 to 1995.

The series concluded on December 30, 2020, when the second half of the sixth season was released in its entirety on Amazon Prime Video in Ireland, ahead of its broadcast on History in Canada from January 1 to March 3, 2021.

Valkyrie Apocalypse sous titré Record of Ragnarok, est un seinen manga scénarisé par Shinya Umemura et Takumi Fukui et dessiné par Ajichika, prépublié dans le magazine Monthly Comic Zenon depuis novembre 2017 et publié par Coamix en volumes reliés depuis mai 2018.

Tanjiro Kamado is a kind-hearted and intelligent boy who lives with his family in the mountains. He became his family s breadwinner after his father s death, making trips to the nearby village to sell charcoal.

Jeffrey Lionel Dahmer , also known as the Milwaukee Cannibal or the Milwaukee Monster, was an American serial killer and sex offender who killed and dismembered seventeen men and boys between 1978 and 1991.
